title: SpongeBob SquarePants
short_plot_summary: SpongeBob SquarePants, a square sponge living in a pineapple under the sea, goes on adventures with his best friends Patrick Star and Sandy Cheeks, and works at the Krusty Krab restaurant.
explanation: A pineapple, representing SpongeBob's iconic pineapple house
A wave, symbolizing the underwater setting of Bikini Bottom
A fish, indicating the various sea creatures with whom SpongeBob interacts throughout the series
An octopus, referring to SpongeBob's grumpy neighbor, Squidward Tentacles
A crab, representing SpongeBob's employer, Mr. Krabs, and the Krusty Krab restaurant where SpongeBob works
